text: Ndipo mâ€™dziko muli njira zoyandikirana ndi minda ya mitengo ya mphesa ndi minda yobzalidwa ndi chimanga, nkhalango za mitengo ya tende, zofanana ndi zina zosafanana. Zipatso zake zimathiriridwa ndi madzi a mtundu umodzi: Ife timazipanga zina kukhala zabwino kupitirira zinzake pakudya. Ndithudi mu zimenezi muli zizindikiro kwa anthu oganiza
